basics.label: Astrophysicist
basics.summary: PhD-trained astrophysicist with 7+ years of experience in data analysis and project management within the academic research sector. Proficient in Python (pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib) and SQL-style querying, with strong skills in statistical analysis and visualization and proven ability to communicate findings clearly to diverse audiences. Dedicated educator with multiple teaching fellowships and recognition for outstanding teaching performance. Experienced collaborator with strong technical expertise in Python-based data analysis, astronomical software, and scientific communication. Now seeking to transition into industry, where I can apply my analytical, technical, and problem-solving skills to real-world challenges in data science, analytics, or related roles.
